questions.question: Ni iyihe ntumbero y'agakorwa?
answers: Gufasha abanyeshure kumenya intambuko bategerezwa gufata kugira bashike ku mahangiro yabo.
Gufasha abanyeshure gushira ku muzirikanyi no kwibuka ivyo bize.
Gufasha abanyeshure kwiga gukorera mu mugwi no guhanahana ivyiyumviro umwe n'uwundi.

questions.question: Ni ibihe imigwi y'abanyeshure itegerezwa gufata nka nkama muri kano gakorwa?
answers: Urutonde rw'ibishobisho vyanditswe ku rubaho.
Ibibazo vyo kubazanya mu gihe hari ikiganiro
Urukurikirane rw'ibikorwa vyakozwe n'umwigisha

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Notegerezwa guhindura umurwi watanguye ubwa mbere ku muzunguruko uwo ariwo wose kugira ngo imigwi yose igire amahirwe yo kuba iya mbere, iya kari iya gatatu canke ubwa nyuma.
Notegerezwa kubwira abanyeshure urutonde mu gihe batavyibuka bonyene ubwabo
Notegerezwa kuraba ko abanyeshure bose bimenyereje ku mwanya umwe

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Notegerezwa gukarira abanyeshure
Notegerezwa kukagumisha mu kwongeramwo ibikorwa vyinshi canke kugenda nihutisha ibikorwa
Notegerezwa guhata abanyeshure kwishura inyishu zibereye

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Notegerezwa gusaba abanyeshure bakuze gusubiramwo ibikorwa basubira inyuma canke ngasaba umugwi uwo ariwo wose kwongeramwo igikorwa mu rukurikirane rw'ibikorwa kugira ngo uwundi mugwi uvyibuke
Notegerezwa gukora ibikorwa vyinshi mu rukurikirane rw'abana bato
Notegerezwa kubasigurira amategeko gusa sindabereke uko bikorwa

questions.question: Ni akahe karore k'ikibazo wobaza abanyeshure bawe mu mwanya w'ikiganiro c'aka gakorwa hitamwo inyishu imwe ibereye)
answers: Ni gute woshobora gukorera mu runani hamwe n'abandi mu buzima bwa misi yose?

Ni ubuhe bumenyi wakoresheje mu kugenzura ibishobisho vyawe?

questions.question: Wokora iki mu gihe abanyeshure bawe badakoze neza ako gakorwa mu mwanya wa mbere bimenyereje?

Notegerezwa gutangura kwimenyereza n'igitigiri gito mu rukurikirane rwanje kandi nkimenyereza agakorwa imisi yose

Gufasha abanyeshure kwibuka amategeko agoye no kubafasha kwiyumvira imbere yo gukora

questions.question: Ni gute wogora abanyeshure muri kano gakorwa
answers: Mu kubabaza kwiyumvira ukugene botatura impari canke imishamirano

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Notegertezwa misi yose gutanga ivyisungwa mu rutonde rutandukanye mu kuvangamwo amategeko nka: "kora ku mutwe", "kora ku bitugu", "kora ku mavi" canke "kora ku mano"
Notegerezwa gutangura kino gikorwa mu gutanga ivyisungwa mu rutonde rumwe: kora ku mutwe, ibitugu, amavi, hanyuma amano.
Nokwizigira ko abanyeshure bobikora neza mu kwimenyereza ubwa mbere

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Notegerezwa kudomako urutoke ku banyeshure mu gihe bariko baritwara uko bitabereye no gukoresha inzira zo kubatera intege
Notegerazwa kugumiza ibihimba vy'umubiri ku rutonde rumwe ibihe vyose
Notegerezwa guhagarika kwimenyereza hamwe n'abanyeshure mugihe badakoze neza umwimenyerezo wa mbere.

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kutaba uriko urakora?
answers: Sinotegerezwa gutera intege abanyeshure ngo bongere bagerageze kandi naho boba bakoze ikosa.
Sinotegerezwa gukabukanya amazina y'ibihimba vy'umubiri
Sinotegerezwa kugira agakorwa akagoye mu kunyarutsa canke mu kwongerako amategeko mu gihe abana biriko birabagumira

questions.question: Ni ibiki umunyeshure yotegerezwa kuvuga mu mwanya wo kurongora ikiganiro c'agakorwa?

questions.question: Ni kubera iki ari ngira kamaro imisi yose kuvuga ivyisungwa mu rutonde rumwe: kora ku mutwe,ku bitugu, ku mavi hanyuma ku mano?
